name: ConceptMapR5CountElementsForR4Count
title: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4
description: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

target.comment:
FHIR R5 ComplexType `Count` is representable via FHIR R4B extensions.
Element `Count` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Count`.

FHIR R5 ComplexType `Count` is representable via FHIR DSTU2 extensions.
Element `Count` is mapped to FHIR DSTU2 element `Quantity`.
Element `Count.value` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Count.value`.
Element `Count.value` is mapped to FHIR DSTU2 element `Quantity.value`.

Note that the target element context `Count.comparator` is a modifier element, so this extension does not need to be defined as a modifier.
Element `Count.comparator` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Count.comparator`.

Note that the target element context `Quantity.comparator` is a modifier element, so this extension does not need to be defined as a modifier.
Element `Count.comparator` is mapped to FHIR DSTU2 element `Quantity.comparator`.
Element `Count.unit` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Count.unit`.
Element `Count.unit` is mapped to FHIR DSTU2 element `Quantity.unit`.
Element `Count.system` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Count.system`.
Element `Count.system` is mapped to FHIR DSTU2 element `Quantity.system`.
Element `Count.code` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Count.code`.
Element `Count.code` is mapped to FHIR DSTU2 element `Quantity.code`.
